API Reference#

This section covers all the public interfaces of analysis-functions.

Primary Modules#

The following modules include the majority of the API relevant for most users:

  • Target Annotation
    • TargetAnnotation
  • Extract Table
    • ExtractTable

Secondary Modules#

The following modules are mainly for internal use, and are relevant for contributors and advanced users:

  • Open Targets
    • request_open_targets()
    • request_ot_associated_targets()
    • request_ot_target_annotation()
    • request_ot_target_disease_evidences()
  • Pharos
    • request_pharos()
    • request_pharos_target_annotation()
  • Retry
    • Retryer
  • Exceptions
    • EmptyOpenTargetsResponse
    • EmptyPharosResponse
    • InvalidDiseaseID
    • InvalidEnsembleId
    • InvalidOntologyId
    • InvalidOutcomes
    • InvalidQueryParameter
    • InvalidStatusCode
    • InvalidTargets
  • Util
    • check_var_in_data()
    • get_columns_from_regex_list()
    • get_ensembl_from_uniprot()
